Texts.Chs: 探寻盐水之星遗迹的日志。
Texts.Eng: An examination of the Brine Star ruins.

Texts.Chs: 我活着来到了废墟之中，住在废墟里的叶族并不是普通的叶族，它们似乎并不吃肉，并且建立了与某种准则。某天，我亲眼目睹了他们的献祭过程。
Texts.Eng:
I've done all I can here. The Floran living amidst the ruins appear to be unnaturally savage, even by Floran standards, but they aren't my main problem. There are things deeper in the temple, and eyes and ears aren't their only senses.

It's also getting harder to stay hidden. I had a close brush the other day while witnessing some kind of ritual.

Texts.Chs: 最终，我被叶族守卫发现了，我不得不匆忙逃离，幸好我侥幸逃出来了，可惜的是我没有时间把我所携带的物品带走。
Texts.Eng: Needless to say, I almost got discovered and had to flee before their warriors homed in on my position. I'm done here - I'm not even going to stay long enough to pack up my equipment.

Texts.Chs: 我当时看到有一个叶族人把一只兔子放进祭祀坑内，然后使用大火进行献祭仪式。他们使用了兔子，但是我觉得任何小型动物都可以成为祭品。
Texts.Eng: Was too engrossed with watching one of the Florans drop a helpless bunny into an altar's concave surface and sacrifice it, consigning it to the flames. They have bunnies, but I think any critter would have been an appropriate sacrifice.
